mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, logo_ico, logo_img, website_title, website_keyword, website_desc, copyright, icp, prn, weixin, weixin_xcx, weibo, is_enable_statistics, statistics_code, is_show_service, service1, service2, user_agreement, recruit_title, recruit_info, entry_agreement from springboot1.website where id = #{id}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, logo_ico, logo_img, website_title, website_keyword, website_desc, copyright, icp, prn, weixin, weixin_xcx, weibo, is_enable_statistics, statistics_code, is_show_service, service1, service2, user_agreement, recruit_title, recruit_info, entry_agreement from springboot1.website limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into springboot1.website(gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, logo_ico, logo_img, website_title, website_keyword, website_desc, copyright, icp, prn, weixin, weixin_xcx, weibo, is_enable_statistics, statistics_code, is_show_service, service1, service2, user_agreement, recruit_title, recruit_info, entry_agreement) values (#{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{statusId}, #{sort}, #{logoIco}, #{logoImg}, #{websiteTitle}, #{websiteKeyword}, #{websiteDesc}, #{copyright}, #{icp}, #{prn}, #{weixin}, #{weixinXcx}, #{weibo}, #{isEnableStatistics}, #{statisticsCode}, #{isShowService}, #{service1}, #{service2}, #{userAgreement}, #{recruitTitle}, #{recruitInfo}, #{entryAgreement})
mapper.update:
update springboot1.website
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
status_id = #{statusId},
sort = #{sort},
logo_ico = #{logoIco},
logo_img = #{logoImg},
website_title = #{websiteTitle},
website_keyword = #{websiteKeyword},
website_desc = #{websiteDesc},
copyright = #{copyright},
icp = #{icp},
prn = #{prn},
weixin = #{weixin},
weixin_xcx = #{weixinXcx},
weibo = #{weibo},
is_enable_statistics = #{isEnableStatistics},
statistics_code = #{statisticsCode},
is_show_service = #{isShowService},
service1 = #{service1},
service2 = #{service2},
user_agreement = #{userAgreement},
recruit_title = #{recruitTitle},
recruit_info = #{recruitInfo},
entry_agreement = #{entryAgreement},
where id = #{id}
